summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department; providing for the construction of pipelines to serve the Bow Lake, Airport and West Seattle districts; providing for the acquisition by purchase of land and other property for a right of way therefor; appropriating money from the Water Fund therefor; repealing Ordinances Nos. 74881 and 75162, as amended by Ordinance No. 79665; and ratifying and confirming the expenditures made therefrom.
